title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        To download program flyers with schedules for free ranger activities, visit our Ranger Programs page. For additional programs, visit the website of our partner, the Sequoia Parks Conservancy.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 7 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks Foothills Feature      Time: 10:00 AM to 10:15 AM Location: Foothills Visitor Center, Sequoia National Park Fees: Free     Thursday, August 4, 2016 Everyday  from 06/02/2016 to 09/05/2016 Take a close-up look at the oak woodlands with a ranger during this short walk! View Details      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks Investigation Station      Time: 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Sequoia National Park, Foothills Visitor Center Fees: Free     Thursday, August 4, 2016 Everyday  from 05/15/2016 to 09/05/2016 Examine a cart full of touchable objects to learn more about the parks' wild plants and animals.  View Details      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks Dark Sky Festival      Location: Throughout Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks     Friday, August 5, 2016 Everyday  from 08/05/2016 to 08/07/2016 Join us as we celebrate the wonders of the night sky! Special events and programs will take place all weekend. View Details      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks Evenings at Potwisha      Location: Potwisha Campground Amphitheater, Sequoia National Park Fees: Free     Friday, August 5, 2016 Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/27/2016 to 09/03/2016 Gather 'round for an old-fashioned evening with a ranger. Check Foothills Visitor Center or campgrounds for times and topics. View Details      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks Jr. Ranger Round-up      Location: Potwisha Campground Amphitheater Fees: Free     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/28/2016 to 09/03/2016 Discover what makes this place special and how we can all do our part to enjoy and protect it. Check Foothills Visitor Center for times. View Details      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks "Happy 100th Birthday" National Park Service!      Location: Throughout the parks Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join us for various activities to celebrate the 100th birthday of the National Park Service! View Details      Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks Ersa of the Red Trees (Pageant)      Location: Sequoia National Park, Giant Forest     Friday, August 26, 2016 Everyday  from 08/26/2016 to 08/28/2016 Be transported back to 1926...
